version_description: Users can now select an upload region for better performance.
Users can now select an upload region for better performance.

Lots of new updates! Here’s what’s in store for you:

• Brand new editing workflow - this version simplifies the previous four screen flow into a simple page, consolidates some of your favorite tools, and automates the work we can handle ourselves.
• Redesigned Keywording Tool - This version makes it far easier to add keywords, by combining the separate tools and making it easy to quickly toggle the best keywords.
• Dark Theme - Contributor Mobile has a new feel to it! We’ve applied a new “dark theme” to the screens as a way to make it look sharp - and also to help the eye focus on keywords and other copy.

Lots of new updates! Here’s what’s in store for you:

• Brand new editing workflow - this version simplifies the previous four screen flow into a simple page, consolidates some of your favorite tools, and automates the work we can handle ourselves.
• Redesigned Keywording Tool - This version makes it far easier to add keywords, by combining the separate tools and making it easy to quickly toggle the best keywords.
• Dark Theme - Contributor Mobile has a new feel to it! We’ve applied a new “dark theme” to the screens as a way to make it look sharp - and also to help the eye focus on keywords and other copy.

Bonjour! Hola! Cześć! Here’s what’s in store for you:
- Localized in 14 languages: Contributor Mobile is now localized in the following languages: German, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, European Portuguese, Russian, Swedish, Turkish, and Hong Kong Chinese
- Title Translator Beta: For non-English contributors editing submissions, this beta feature helps you craft a title in your preferred language, and then translate it to English
- Faster, redesigned upload process: Uploads are now much faster and easier to do, especially for slow connections
- Redesigned submission screen: submission status information is now simplified and easier to read

Briefs have gotten a refresh! Here’s what’s in store for you in this update:
· New look and feel for briefs so you can easily find the briefs you need
· Quickly see which briefs are new and ending soon
· Easy access to the briefs that you’ve shown interest in
· Application enhancements to make it even easier for new contributors to join

We’ve added three new features to the Contributor by Getty Images app to improve your experience: Dashboard, Profile, and Interests pages. Now you can personalize your interests as a Creative contributor, access settings and links all in one place, and get more information on important topics like Custom Content, keywording and releases.

We’ve added three new features to the Contributor by Getty Images app to improve your experience: Dashboard, Profile, and Interests pages. Now you can personalize your interests as a Creative contributor, access settings and links all in one place, and get more information on important topics like Custom Content, keywording and releases.
